description:
Bucciarati is able to defeat Zucchero, a member of Passione who was after Polpo`s fortune and also save his friends. But they find out that Zucchero was in contact with someone else on Capri and was planning to meet up with them, thanks to Moody Jazz`s ability. Mista and Giorno decide to head over to Capri first to try to find Zucchero`s partner and get rid of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セックス・ピストルズ登場 その①
